name: OpenStreetMap Vancouver
description: Mappers and OpenStreetMap users in the Vancouver, BC area

events.name: April Metrotown Mappy Hour
events.description: Mappy Hour is the time and place for discussion of OpenStreetMap, from surveying data to consuming data. Beginners welcome. Bring your questions.
events.where: Firefighters' Public House, 6515 Bonsor Avenue, Burnaby, BC
